    • Uses of Connection in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server

      Fields in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server with type parameters of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Connection> Server.identifiedDevices
      The list of devices, that have identified themselves.
      private java.util.List<Connection> Server.unidentifiedDevices
      The list of devices that have not identified themselves yet.
      Methods in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server with parameters of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void Server.addUnidentifiedDevice(Connection connection)
      Adds the passed Connection to Server.unidentifiedDevices, removing any already contained Connections with the same device.
      private void Server.identifyDevice(Connection connection)
      Takes a Connection and adds it to the list of identified devices.
      private void Server.linkDevices(Connection connection)
      Tries to establish a link between a PhoneConnection and a CarConnection.
      The passed connection has to be the PhoneConnection that requested control over a car.
      private void Server.removeDevice(Connection connection)
      Removes the passed Connection either from Server.unidentifiedDevices or Server.identifiedDevices, whichever list contains the element.
      private void Server.updateCarInformations(Connection connection)
      Checks if the passed Connection is an instance of a CarConnection and updates Server.carInformations with the passed CarConnections car information, if so.
      protected boolean ConnectionAcceptor.writeToOperationQueue(EOperationType operationType, Connection connection)
      Creates a new QueueElement with the passed operation-type and Connection and puts it on the ConnectionAcceptor.operationQueue.

    • Uses of Connection in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections

      Subclasses of Connection in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CarConnection
      This class is used to communicate with a car via a TCP-connection (see Connection class for more information on the basic functionalities).
      It holds the reference to the PhoneConnection of a linked phone (if any) in order to be able to forward information such as sensor-data to it.
      This class provides the means for a linked phone to send data (e.g.
      class  PhoneConnection
      This class is used to communicate with a phone via a TCP-connection (see Connection class for more information on the basic functionalities).
      It holds the reference to the CarConnection of a linked car (if any) in order to be able to forward information such as control-data to it.
      Methods in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections with parameters of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean Connection.forwardMessageToDevice(Connection conn)
      Converts this objects forwardMessageMap to a JSON-String and writes that String to the Sockets outputStream of the passed Connection.
